tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (X (X (ADVP (RB Theres)) (NP (NN something))) (ADJP (JJ amazing) (PP (IN about) (S (VP (VBG connecting) (PP (IN with) (NP (NNS friends))) (PP (IN from) (NP (NN childhood) (CC and) (NN feeling))) (PP (IN like) (NP (NNS theres))) (SBAR (ADVP (RB never)) (RB even) (FRAG (VP (VBN been) (NP (NN distance)))))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [amazing/JJ dep>[something/NN dep>Theres/RB] advcl>[connecting/VBG mark>about/IN nmod:with>[friends/NNS case>with/IN] nmod:from>[childhood/NN case>from/IN cc>and/CC conj:and>feeling/NN] nmod:from>feeling/NN nmod:like>[theres/NNS case>like/IN] dep>[distance/NN neg>never/RB advmod>even/RB cop>been/VBN]]]
